content: My department currently advertises an associate professorship position that could also be interesting for people doing Lean. The research area can be any kind of mathematics but it should be argued that it is relevant to our new study programme "Engineering mathematics". If you have any questions about the department, feel free to contact me, I know the department quite well, but am not on the hiring committee. The deadline for application is 11 August 2025. For more information, see https://www.uu.se/om-uu/jobba-hos-oss/lediga-jobb/jobbannons?query=833862
